Package com.geolud.atomica.ui

Provides all classes for the user interface (view).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationFrame
    This class represents the main window of the application.
    EditorPanel
    Allows the user to create an initial game situation.
    GamePanel
    Displays the a game with its statistical information like the score and the current level) plus the game board with all tokens taking place on it.
    GameSettingsPanel
    User Interface for the configuration of the game settings.
    HelpPanel
    Displays the html help considering the language.
    LanguageDialog
    A Dialog which lets the user select a language.

Package com.geolud.atomica.ui Description

Provides all classes for the user interface (view).
